intro: Psychotria saltiensis, commonly known as the Saltiense Psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to tropical regions of South America, particularly Brazil. The plant is characterized by its simple, opposite leaves and small, clustered white or greenish-white flowers. It produces small, red berries that are typically consumed by various bird species. Psychotria saltiensis is often found in humid, shaded understory environments of tropical forests.
